product.title: The A Book | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
From beloved authors Stan and Jan Berenstain comes an awesome adventure all about the letter A. Early learners will eagerly follow along with a curious young bear who wants to know why an army of ants is advancing across all kinds of things that start with the letter A—and they’ll giggle when they find out the answer in the Berenstains' A Book!

Tie-in Activity: For extra fun, you can “advance” your fingers across your baby’s arm as the ants move along in the story. Or point to a familiar A object the first time it appears and let your child “read” that word to you.
